=== le’a/le’i/le’o family coverage ===

le’a tavla
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (sumti_base lea) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (word))))))
    (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (brivla))))))

le’i tavla
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (sumti_base lehi) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (word))))))
    (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (brivla))))))

le’o tavla
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (sumti_base leo) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (word))))))
    (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (brivla))))))
